name: Coffeepot Runner
description:
Entry to the 8bit to Infinity - PaletteJam2

This is a simple runner game.
You use 'Space' to jump and see how long you can hold out, before all your coffee is gone.

Coffee cups are the enemy
Coffee beans give you a bit of coffee back

Bug:
For some reason the background and ground does not work as intended in the Web version.
For the full experience, I uploaded a Windows version for download.
